p.s: A simple caching output controller for Savant
p.d: Savant output can be cached for faster rendering. PEAR2_Templates_Savant_Turbo allows rendered content to be cached, and reused for subsequent requests. For basic use, instead of creating a new `PEAR2\Templates\Savant\Main` object, create a `PEAR2\Templates\Savant\Turbo` object. In models you'd like to have cached, implement the `CacheableInterface`.
